components.description: A long silver saw with a wooden handle. Used to represent construction, carpentry, renovation, or tools in general.
components.title: Carpentry Saw

version.description:
Unicode 13.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on March 10, 2020. 55 new emoji code points were added in this release, with all 117 new emojis for 2020 (including sequences for gender and skin tone) listed under Emoji 13.0.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the carpentry saw emoji features a robust, metallic saw blade with finely rendered teeth, complemented by a smooth, ergonomically shaped wooden handle. The glossy 3D shading and nuanced lighting on Apple devices give this tool a strong, dependable appearance, symbolizing construction, craftsmanship, and the effort involved in building or creating. Itâ€™s a direct and effective way to communicate about projects, repairs, or the process of making something new.
